name: City Run (MikeFaragalla)
description:
City Run is an obstacle course game - similar to the game Fall Guys. It is a single player game with a series of challenges that the player must overcome in order to complete the level and move on to the next level. In this level in particular, the player is faced with 4 main challenges, each varying in their level of difficulty. 

Focus, take your time, and make it through to the other side alive.  

CONTROLS:

W, A, S, D - walk around 

Shift - sprint 

Space - jump

Mouse - control camera 

Game Documentation: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1N__96EUcPx6BYXxMFKpdKu6me6jCEdMcHn8yPTuIXD8/...
